subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Marlins may not win the N.L. East, but their identity as an underfinanced underdog is over. In signing Reyes, Buehrle and Bell in the past week, the Marlins have guaranteed $191 million.
snippet: The Marlins may not win the N.L. East, but their identity as an underfinanced underdog is over. In signing Reyes, Buehrle and Bell in the past week, the Marlins have guaranteed $191 million.
